o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Entity_CleanEntity
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) ' The CleanObject function on any Extensible object returns true if anything was cleaned. ' False return value doesn't mean something went wrong, only that nothing was cleaned.
' Clean the attributes. Dim objAttribute For Each objAttribute In obj.Attributes If objAttribute.CleanObject() Then WriteInfo("Succesfully cleaned " & objAttribute.DisplayName) End If Next
' Clean the mappings. Dim objMapping For Each objMapping In obj.Mappings If objMapping.CleanObject() Then WriteInfo("Succesfully cleaned " & objMapping.DisplayName) End If Next
' Clean the entity. If obj.CleanObject() Then WriteInfo("Succesfully cleaned " & obj.DisplayName) End If
WriteInfo("Done cleaned " & obj.DisplayName) End Sub
